name: Unicorn Unicycle
description:
Race against the clock in this crazy physics-based platformer. Just be sure not to lose your balance—or your monocle!

Made for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam, "Only One."

ControlsA and D to pedal left and right, respectively.
Left and Right arrow keys to lean in that direction. CreditsGame by Grant Matteo, Jared Beller, and Forrest Matteo
Art by Elizabeth Swindell, Forrest Matteo, and Jared Beller
